Description:
Assist the Head Chef in overseeing all aspects of the kitchen operations, including food preparation, cooking, and presentation.
Collaborate with the kitchen team to ensure efficient and smooth kitchen functioning during service hours.
Prepare and cook dishes according to established recipes and quality standards.
Assist in creating and updating menus, incorporating seasonal ingredients and culinary trends.
Maintain high standards of food quality, taste, and presentation under the guidance of the Head Chef.
Monitor and control food inventory to minimize waste and ensure availability of ingredients.
Adhere to food safety and sanitation regulations, ensuring a clean and hygienic kitchen environment.
Participate in training programs to enhance culinary skills and maintain continuous learning.
Support the Head Chef in planning and executing menus for special events and catering functions.
Collaborate effectively with the kitchen staff and communicate instructions clearly.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience in a culinary role, such as line cook or prep cook, with a passion for cooking and culinary arts.
Knowledge of basic culinary techniques, food preparation, and kitchen equipment operation.
Strong willingness to learn and develop culinary skills under the guidance of the Head Chef.
Ability to work effectively as part of a team, following instructions and collaborating with kitchen staff.
Basic understanding of food safety and sanitation practices to maintain a clean and hygienic kitchen.
Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays, aligning with the restaurant's operating hours.
Physical stamina to stand for extended periods and perform various kitchen tasks.
A culinary degree or relevant certifications are a plus but not mandatory. Relevant experience and a willingness to learn are highly valued.
Demonstrate a positive attitude, strong work ethic, and ability to handle pressure during busy hours.
Exhibit creativity and enthusiasm for experimenting with new recipes and culinary concepts.

As an Assistant Chef, meeting these requirements will enable you to support the Head Chef effectively, contribute to the kitchen's smooth functioning, and play a crucial role in delivering high-quality dishes and an exceptional dining experience for customers.
